[Home](./index.md) &gt; [assistive-playwright-client](./assistive-playwright-client.md) &gt; [VMMouse](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.md) &gt; [click](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.click.md)

## VMMouse.click() method

Shortcut for [move](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.move.md)<!-- -->, [down](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.down.md) and [up](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.up.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
click(x: number, y: number, options?: {
        button?: "left" | "middle" | "right" | undefined;
        clickCount?: number | undefined;
        delay?: number | undefined;
        origin?: ElementHandle<HTMLElement | SVGElement> | null;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | horizontal destination position of the mouse in pixels |
|  y | number | vertical destination position of the mouse in pixels |
|  options | { button?: "left" \| "middle" \| "right" \| undefined; clickCount?: number \| undefined; delay?: number \| undefined; origin?: ElementHandle&lt;HTMLElement \| SVGElement&gt; \| null; } | <code>button</code>: mouse button to use, defaults to <code>&quot;left&quot;</code> <code>clickCount</code>: number of <code>down</code> and <code>up</code> events to send, defaults to <code>1</code> <code>delay</code>: delay in milliseconds between <code>down</code> and <code>up</code> events <code>origin</code>: DOM element whose center is the origin of the coordinates passed in <code>x</code> and <code>y</code>. If null or undefined, the coordinates are relative to the top-left corner of the viewport. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
